special_text:
[+1]: Exile the top three cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards. Cast cards exiled this way by sacrificing an artifact or token in addition to paying their other costs.
[+1]: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.
[-3]: Elai and Lanion deals 4 damage to target creature. Excess damage is dealt to each other creature and each opponent instead.
[-7]: You get an emblem with “You may cast copies of the spell most recently cast this turn.” [i](You still pay its costs. Timing rules still apply.)[/i]
